title: Calories in Pinot Noir
meta_description: Discover calories in pinot noir per standard glass, plus carbs, alcohol content, nutrition breakdown, and serving tweaks for wine lovers.
assumptions: Dry red wine, standard 5 fl oz (148 ml) pour; alcohol by volume ~13%; no added sugars.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, vintage, region, sweetness level, and serving size. Check bottle labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 5 fl oz glass of Pinot Noir has about 125 kcal, mostly from alcohol and minimal carbs.

faqs.q: How many calories in a glass of Pinot Noir?
faqs.a: About 125 kcal in a standard 5 fl oz serving of dry Pinot Noir.

faqs.q: Does Pinot Noir have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Minimal: ~3.8 g carbs and 0.9 g sugars per 5 fl oz, mostly from grapes.
